sources.note: Mandatory disclosures / certified products page. Lists MicroMD EMR with 2015 Edition CEHRT certification, describes product suite including PM, EMR, e-Rx, patient engagement, and cloud options.

Main website. Describes MicroMD as 'Simple. Customizable. Connected.' platform for independent practices. Lists core products: PM, EMR, e-prescribing, telehealth, patient engagement, digital intake. Claims 12-year customer retention and 98% support satisfaction.

EMR product page. Details clinical documentation features (SOAP, templates, speech recognition), e-prescribing, lab and device integration, clinical dashboard, image management, deployment options (client-server and cloud ASP).

Practice management product page. Covers scheduling, eligibility verification, billing, claims management, payment posting, patient statements, payment plans, credit card processing, AR reporting, RBRVS benchmarking.

Integration and interoperability page. Documents HL7/XML/API support, ODBC database access, lab interfaces (LabCorp, Quest, others), DMS integration, clearinghouse partners, EDI connections, hospital interfaces.
Community health center page. Details FQHC/CHC/RHC features: sliding fee schedules, UDS reporting, dental billing (ADA/Dentrix), temporary registration, OCR scanning.
DMS product page. Describes document management module for scanning, indexing, storing patient and non-patient documents, e-faxes, markup/annotation tools, integration with PM.
Secure Chart patient portal listing in MicroMD marketplace. Two-way messaging, appointment scheduling, lab results sharing, intake forms, reminders.
Press release about Medpod telehealth integration launched with MicroMD EMR Version 17. HIPAA-secure video visits documented in EMR.
Acquisition record: Henry Schein acquired MicroMD on October 26, 2006. MicroMD founded in 1982, based in Youngstown, OH.
Crunchbase profile for Henry Schein MicroMD confirming subsidiary relationship and Youngstown, OH location.

Capterra review page. Overall 3.2/5 from ~20 reviews. Users praise intuitive interface and lab/device integration; criticize reporting as antiquated and integration limitations for flat-file transfers.
Software Advice profile. Lists features, pricing (~$200/mo per user), and positions MicroMD as cloud-based EMR with integrated PM.
EMRFinder review. Confirms eight specialty focuses, KLAS 2017 Best Ambulatory EMR/PM recognition, lab and device integrations.
2017 press release about Henry Schein MicroMD EMR earning ONC Health IT certification from Drummond Group. Identifies Henry Schein Medical Systems as the certifying entity.
